scripts.say: You've become stronger. I won't be able to use the same old tricks on you... *chuckles*
I learned from the best, after all...
With that, I have nothing else to teach you. Mmhmm, your big sister is proud of you~
W-wait, "big sister?"
... Kaga, listen to me!
Amagi's expression quickly changed from jovial to serious as she looked Kaga in the eye.
I have said before that the world does not judge who is strong and who is weak.
I, Amagi, was born into this world flawed- what you would call weak.
However, because I wanted to protect Akagi, and everyone else in the fleet, even this weakling tried to become "strong."
That is why I desperately threw myself at my studies and training, so that people would assume that I was naturally "strong."
Perhaps you have realized it as well. In the end, I was not able to attain true strength.
Though many have not yet realized it, the seas will soon be ruled by aircraft carriers.
And when that time comes, you and Akagi will form the foundation for the Sakura Fleet's future.
You will encounter opponents just like you from all across the world - nay, even stronger than you.
But remember to never underestimate your enemies, and always strive to become stronger.
Unlike me, who was born a weakling, you were born strong. And you are destined to become even stronger.
For you and Akagi, your strength is both your birthright and your obligation.ã€‚
Therefore, remember me not as Amagi "the weak," but rather as Amagi "the strong." Pick up my mantle and become that strength that I could only represent.
Please, protect the Sakura Empire in my stead...
... ... And please take care of my sister, Akagi...
